# The `function_traits` Struct Template Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

This class provides various trait information about a callable object. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Declaration

<CodeBlock>template &lt;typename T, bool isClass = std::is&#95;class&lt;T&gt;::value&gt;
struct llvm::function_traits&lt;T, isClass&gt;</CodeBlock>

## Description {#details}

This class provides various trait information about a callable object.

<ul>
<li>To access the number of arguments: Traits::num&#95;args</li>
<li>To access the type of an argument: Traits::arg&#95;t&lt;Index&gt;</li>
<li>To access the type of the result: Traits::result&#95;t</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 86 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/adt/stlextras-h">STLExtras.h</a>.
